name: Genesis
description: Creation, Fall, Flood, Patriarchs
author: Moses (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Exodus
description: Israel's deliverance from Egypt and receiving the Law at Sinai
author: Moses
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Leviticus
description: Laws for holiness, worship, sacrifices, and priestly ministry.
author: Moses
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Numbers
description: Wilderness journey, censuses, rebellion, and preparation to enter Canaan.
author: Moses
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Deuteronomy
description: Moses final covenant sermons before Israel enters the land.
author: Moses
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 1 Samuel
description: Transition from judges to monarchy; Saul reign and David rise.
author: Samuel, Gad, Nathan (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 2 Samuel
description: David reign over Israel, covenant promise, victories, and failures.
author: Gad, Nathan (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 1 Kings
description: Solomon reign, temple construction, and division of the kingdom.
author: Jeremiah (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 2 Kings
description: History of divided kingdoms through exile and Jerusalem destruction.
author: Jeremiah (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Jeremiah
description: Prophetic warnings, calls to repentance, and hope amid coming judgment.
author: Jeremiah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Ezra
description: Return from exile and restoration of worship and covenant life.
author: Ezra
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Nehemiah
description: Rebuilding Jerusalem walls and spiritual reform in Judah.
author: Nehemiah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Joshua
description: Conquest and settlement of the Promised Land under Joshua.
author: Joshua (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Judges
description: Cycles of sin, oppression, and deliverance through judges.
author: Samuel (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Ruth
description: Story of loyalty and redemption in the time of judges.
author: Samuel (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 1 Chronicles
description: Genealogies and David's reign from a priestly perspective.
author: Ezra (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: 2 Chronicles
description: History of Judah's kings from Solomon to exile.
author: Ezra (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Esther
description: God's providence preserving Jews in Persian exile.
author: Unknown
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Isaiah
description: Prophecies of judgment, comfort, and messianic hope.
author: Isaiah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Lamentations
description: Poetic mourning over the destruction of Jerusalem.
author: Jeremiah (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Ezekiel
description: Visions of judgment and restoration from Babylonian exile.
author: Ezekiel
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Daniel
description: Faithfulness in exile and apocalyptic visions of future kingdoms.
author: Daniel
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Hosea
description: God's faithful love depicted through Hosea's marriage.
author: Hosea
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Joel
description: Call to repentance and promise of the Spirit's outpouring.
author: Joel
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Amos
description: Warnings of judgment against social injustice.
author: Amos
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Obadiah
description: Judgment against Edom for betraying Judah.
author: Obadiah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Jonah
description: God's mercy extending beyond Israel to Nineveh.
author: Jonah (traditional)
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Micah
description: Justice, mercy, and messianic promises from Bethlehem.
author: Micah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Nahum
description: Prophecy of Nineveh's destruction and God's justice.
author: Nahum
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Habakkuk
description: Wrestling with God's justice and living by faith.
author: Habakkuk
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Zephaniah
description: Day of the Lord judgment and promise of a faithful remnant.
author: Zephaniah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Haggai
description: Call to rebuild the temple after exile.
author: Haggai
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Zechariah
description: Visions of restoration and messianic prophecies.
author: Zechariah
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)

name: Malachi
description: Final prophetic call to covenant faithfulness.
author: Malachi
sources: Hindson & Yates, The Essence of the Old Testament (B&H Academic, 2012)
Walton, Chronological and Background Charts of the Old Testament (Zondervan, 1994)
